mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_task(title, start, `end`, color, remindertime, custid, salesid, userid) VALUES (#{title},#{start},#{end},#{color},#{remindertime},#{custid},#{salesid},#{userid})
mapper.update: UPDATE t_task SET done = #{done},color=#{color} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_task WHERE userid = #{userId} and done = 0
SELECT * FROM t_task WHERE userid = #{userId} and date(`end`) < #{today} and done = 0
SELECT * FROM t_task WHERE userid = #{userId} and date(start) >= #{start} and date(`end`) <= #{end}
